My Work

You can check out some of my work here.

Encounter Web Design LLC Github The site for my web design company, Encounter Web Design LLC.
Custom Carpentry Website Github Responsive site for a local company using mostly HTML5 and CSS
Favorite Coffeeshop Tracker App Github Fullstack web app using React, Express, Node.js and MongoDB, Geocoder among others where users can update a MapBox map with their favorite local coffee shops.
React Tic Tac Toe Game Github A simple Tic Tac Toe game built using React Hooks and Material-UI
